Plants.name: Cornflower
Plants.Care Instructions: Drought tolerant; great for attracting bees.

Plants.name: Trillium
Plants.Care Instructions: Wildflowers; do not pick as they take years to regrow.

Plants.name: Turkish Tulip (Anatolia)
Plants.Care Instructions: The original pointed-petal tulip; very hardy.

Plants.name: Brahma Kamal
Plants.Care Instructions: Native to high altitudes; requires cool temperatures and minimal watering.

Plants.name: Jasmine (Mogra)
Plants.Care Instructions: Prune regularly to encourage bushy growth; fertilize every 2 months.

Plants.name: Foxtail Orchid
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs high humidity and good air circulation; mist roots daily.

Plants.name: Marigold (Genda)
Plants.Care Instructions: Deadhead spent blooms to prolong flowering; avoid overwatering.

Plants.name: California Poppy
Plants.Care Instructions: Highly drought-tolerant; sow seeds directly in the ground.

Plants.name: Camellia
Plants.Care Instructions: Mulch to keep roots cool; protect from harsh afternoon sun.

Plants.name: Mountain Laurel
Plants.Care Instructions: Avoid deep planting; requires acidic soil to prevent yellowing leaves.

Plants.name: Tulip
Plants.Care Instructions: Plant bulbs in Autumn; requires a cold dormant period to bloom.

Plants.name: Cherry Blossom (Sakura)
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires minimal pruning; susceptible to pests if soil is too wet.

Plants.name: Kangaroo Paw
Plants.Care Instructions: Cut back to the ground after flowering to encourage new growth.

Plants.name: Bottlebrush
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely hardy; prune after flowering to maintain shape.

Plants.name: King Protea
Plants.Care Instructions: Low phosphorus fertilizer only; requires excellent drainage.

Plants.name: Strelitzia (Bird of Paradise)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Feed with slow-release fertilizer; sensitive to frost.

Plants.name: English Lavender
Plants.Care Instructions: Prune lightly after flowering to prevent woodiness; don't overwater.

Plants.name: Dahlia
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires staking for tall varieties; lift tubers in winter in cold climates.

Plants.name: Cattleya Orchid
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs high humidity; allow the potting medium to dry between waterings.

Plants.name: Brahma Kamal
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires cold climate; native to high altitudes.

Plants.name: Marigold (Genda)
Plants.Growing Months: October, November, December, January, February, March
Plants.Care Instructions: Deadhead regularly; avoid watering on leaves to prevent fungal rot.

Plants.name: Rose (Gulab)
Plants.Growing Months: October, November, December, January, February, March, April
Plants.Care Instructions: Prune in October; feed with organic manure for heavy blooms.

Plants.name: Jasmine (Mogra)
Plants.Growing Months: March, April, May, June, July, August
Plants.Care Instructions: Keep soil moist; prune after blooming to encourage new growth.

Plants.name: Ixora (Jungle Flame)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires humidity; acidify soil occasionally with coffee grounds.

Plants.name: Crossandra (Aboli)
Plants.Growing Months: April, May, June, July, August, September
Plants.Care Instructions: Sensitive to frost; keep soil consistently moist but not soggy.

Plants.name: Foxtail Orchid
Plants.Care Instructions: Mist roots daily; requires very high humidity and airflow.

Plants.name: Lotus (Kamal)
Plants.Care Instructions: Grow in still water ponds; ensure 6+ hours of direct sunlight.

Plants.name: Hibiscus (Joba)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Prune frequently; treat for mealybugs with neem oil spray.

Plants.name: Bougainvillea
Plants.Growing Months: November, December, January, February, March, April, May, June
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely drought-tolerant; blooms best when slightly underwatered.

Plants.name: Periwinkle (Sadabahar)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Low maintenance; highly resistant to pests and heat.

Plants.name: Frangipani (Champa)
Plants.Growing Months: March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October
Plants.Care Instructions: Avoid overwatering in winter; requires minimal fertilization.

Plants.name: Palash (Flame of Forest)
Plants.Care Instructions: Drought-resistant tree; doesn't require extra care once established.

Plants.name: Tuberose (Rajnigandha)
Plants.Care Instructions: Plant bulbs 2 inches deep; needs heavy feeding during growth.

Plants.name: Pansy
Plants.Care Instructions: Keep soil cool and moist; protect from harsh afternoon sun.

Plants.name: Name
Plants.Care Instructions: Care

Plants.name: Chrysanthemum (Guldaudi)
Plants.Care Instructions: Pinch tips early in the season to encourage a bushier plant with more flowers.

Plants.name: Dahlia
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires staking as the flowers are heavy; needs regular liquid fertilizer.

Plants.name: Blue Poppy
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely difficult to grow outside cold,high-altitude zones; needs constant moisture.

Plants.name: Geranium
Plants.Care Instructions: Protect from heavy monsoon rains to prevent root rot.

Plants.name: Amaltas (Golden Shower)
Plants.Care Instructions: A drought-tolerant tree; needs space for roots to spread.

Plants.name: Gulmohar
Plants.Care Instructions: Very fast-growing; ensure it is planted away from building foundations.

Plants.name: Gardenia (Gandharaj)
Plants.Care Instructions: Highly fragrant; keep soil acidic using composted leaves or organic mulch.

Plants.name: Anthurium
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs high humidity (mist daily) and strictly indirect light to avoid leaf burn.

Plants.name: Water Lily (Nilkamal)
Plants.Care Instructions: Ensure the pond has at least 6 inches of water above the soil at all times.

Plants.name: Cannonball Flower (Nagalingam)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Grows directly on the tree trunk; needs plenty of space as it is a large tree.

Plants.name: Oleander (Kaner)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Highly toxic if ingested; very low maintenance and drought resistant.

Plants.name: Rain Lily
Plants.Care Instructions: Bulbs multiply rapidly; they bloom almost immediately after the first monsoon rains.

Plants.name: Desert Rose (Adenium)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Do not overwater; treat it like a cactus. Needs high heat to bloom.

Plants.name: Gaillardia (Blanket Flower)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Very heat tolerant; deadhead to keep the plant blooming throughout the year.

Plants.name: Canna Lily
Plants.Care Instructions: Thrives near water drains or damp spots; requires very little care once established.

Plants.name: Zinnia
Plants.Care Instructions: Sow seeds directly; very attractive to butterflies and easy for beginners.

Plants.name: Sunrose (Portulaca)
Plants.Growing Months: April, May, June, July, August, September, October
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers only open in bright sunlight; perfect for rock gardens or hanging pots.

Plants.name: Morning Glory
Plants.Care Instructions: Fast-growing climber; provide a trellis or fence for support.

Plants.name: Lady's Slipper Orchid
Plants.Care Instructions: Endangered; requires high humidity and cool

Plants.name: Blue Ginger
Plants.Care Instructions: Thrives in forest-like conditions; needs moist

Plants.name: Petunia
Plants.Care Instructions: Great for hanging pots; avoid overwatering the foliage to prevent mold.

Plants.name: Snapdragon (Dog Flower)
Plants.Care Instructions: Deadhead the spikes once they fade to encourage a second flush of blooms.

Plants.name: Calendula (Pot Marigold)
Plants.Care Instructions: Very easy for beginners; flowers are edible and used in herbal balms.

Plants.name: Neelakurinji
Plants.Care Instructions: Famous for blooming once every 12 years; strictly protected in the wild.

Plants.name: Champaca (Champa)
Plants.Growing Months: April, May, June, July, August, September
Plants.Care Instructions: Large tree with highly fragrant flowers; needs space and deep soil.

Plants.name: Firecracker Flower (Kanakambaram)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Commonly used in hair garlands; sensitive to cold and drought.

Plants.name: Spider Lily
Plants.Care Instructions: Thrives in coastal heat; bulbs are very hardy and multiply quickly.

Plants.name: Tecoma (Yellow Bells)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Attracts sunbirds; drought-resistant shrub that needs heavy pruning to stay shaped.

Plants.name: Lantana
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely hardy; can be invasive

Plants.name: Cosmos
Plants.Care Instructions: Sow seeds directly in open ground; does better in less fertile soil.

Plants.name: Balsam (Gul-Mehendi)
Plants.Care Instructions: A staple of the Indian monsoon garden; seeds "pop" when touched.

Plants.name: Sunflower (Surajmukhi)
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires heavy watering during peak summer and support for tall stems.

Plants.name: Verbena
Plants.Growing Months: November, December, January, February, March, April, May
Plants.Care Instructions: Low-growing carpet flower; perfect for borders and rockeries.

Plants.name: Parijat (Night Jasmine)
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers drop at dawn; avoid waterlogging at roots.

Plants.name: Aparajita (Butterfly Pea)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Fast-growing climber; needs a trellis or fence for support.

Plants.name: Madhumalti (Rangoon Creeper)
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers change from white to pink to red; fragrant at night.

Plants.name: Krishna Kamal (Passion Flower)
Plants.Growing Months: March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs vertical support; prune in early spring to control growth.

Plants.name: Raat ki Rani (Night Jasmine)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely fragrant; prune after blooming to prevent leggy growth.

Plants.name: Kachnar (Orchid Tree)
Plants.Care Instructions: Deciduous tree; flowers are edible and used in Indian pickles.

Plants.name: Chandni (Crape Jasmine)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Milky sap; prune to maintain a round shrub shape.

Plants.name: Ashoka Tree
Plants.Care Instructions: Sacred tree; requires deep soil and protection from extreme wind.

Plants.name: Jarul (Pride of India)
Plants.Care Instructions: Maharashtra state flower; very heat tolerant once established.

Plants.name: Gladiolus (Sword Lily)
Plants.Care Instructions: Plant corms in Oct; requires staking for tall flower spikes.

Plants.name: Glory Lily (Kalihari)
Plants.Care Instructions: State flower of TN; all parts are toxic if ingested.

Plants.name: Rhododendron (Burans)
Plants.Care Instructions: Native to hills; flowers are used to make traditional local juice.

Plants.name: Nag Champa
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Common near temples; flowers grow directly from the tree trunk.

Plants.name: Water Lily
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Distinct from Lotus; flowers float directly on the water surface.

Plants.name: Gul-e-Abbas (4 O'Clock)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers open in late afternoon; very easy to grow from seeds.

Plants.name: Allamanda (Golden Trumpet)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Vigorous climber; needs heavy pruning and high humidity.

Plants.name: Pink Trumpet Tree
Plants.Care Instructions: Famous for turning Bangalore streets pink in early spring.

Plants.name: Daffodil
Plants.Care Instructions: Plant bulbs 3x their depth in Autumn; deer resistant.

Plants.name: Hydrangea
Plants.Care Instructions: Soil pH determines color (Acidic = Blue

Plants.name: Peace Lily
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Great air purifier; leaves droop when the plant needs water.

Plants.name: Juhi (Jasmine)
Plants.Care Instructions: Very fragrant; requires regular pruning to avoid becoming a messy vine.

Plants.name: Semal (Silk Cotton)
Plants.Care Instructions: Large red flowers on tall trees; attracts many birds and bees.

Plants.name: Surangi
Plants.Care Instructions: Highly prized for its scent; small flowers used in traditional hair ornaments.

Plants.name: Kunda (Star Jasmine)
Plants.Care Instructions: Unlike other Jasmines

Plants.name: Himalayan Primrose
Plants.Care Instructions: Grows near melting snow; needs cool

Plants.name: Gul-Dopahri (Portulaca)
Plants.Growing Months: April, May, June, July, August, September, October
Plants.Care Instructions: Known as the "Office Flower" because it opens around 10 AM and closes by 4 PM.

Plants.name: Garlic Creeper
Plants.Care Instructions: Leaves smell like garlic when crushed; produces beautiful lavender-colored clusters.

Plants.name: Lipstick Plant
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Epiphytic plant; needs high humidity and misting to thrive indoors or in greenhouses.

Plants.name: Teshu (Palash)
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers are used to make natural orange "Holi" colors.

Plants.name: Indian Shot (Canna)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely easy to grow; can even grow in waterlogged areas near drains.

Plants.name: Sweet Alyssum
Plants.Care Instructions: Low-growing carpet flower; smells like honey and attracts pollinators.

Plants.name: Sthal Padma (Land Lotus)
Plants.Care Instructions: Flowers change color from white in the morning to deep pink by evening.

Plants.name: Bleeding Heart Vine
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs high humidity; protect from dry

Plants.name: Oleander (Kaner)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Avoid planting where pets or children play

Plants.name: Cobra Lily
Plants.Care Instructions: Unique hooded flower; needs organic forest mulch and constant moisture.

Plants.name: Fuchsia
Plants.Care Instructions: Thrives in the cool climates of South Indian hill stations.

Plants.name: Blanket Flower
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Salt-tolerant; excellent for seaside gardens and dry balconies.

Plants.name: Copperpod (Yellow Gulmohar)
Plants.Care Instructions: Produces a carpet of yellow flowers on the ground; very popular city tree.

Plants.name: Jacaranda (Neeli Gulmohar)
Plants.Care Instructions: Avoid heavy pruning; it produces "water sprouts" that ruin the tree's natural shape.

Plants.name: Poinsettia
Plants.Care Instructions: Requires 12+ hours of total darkness at night to turn red; avoid overwatering in winter.

Plants.name: Bird of Paradise
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Slow growing; needs high humidity and liquid feeding every 2 weeks during summer.

Plants.name: Begonia
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Very sensitive to overwatering; needs cool

Plants.name: Sandpaper Vine
Plants.Care Instructions: Beautiful woody climber; needs strong support like a porch or pergola for its heavy vines.

Plants.name: Pagoda Flower
Plants.Care Instructions: Famous for its orange pyramid-shaped clusters; attracts butterflies in large numbers.

Plants.name: Cosmos
Plants.Care Instructions: Thrives in "neglect"; soil that is too rich will result in more leaves and fewer flowers.

Plants.name: Fiddle-leaf Champa
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Unlike common Champa

Plants.name: English Daisy
Plants.Care Instructions: Cannot tolerate the heat of the plains; keep the soil consistently cool and moist.

Plants.name: Mussaenda (Paper Flower)
Plants.Growing Months: May, June, July, August, September, October, November
Plants.Care Instructions: The colorful "flowers" are actually bracts; needs regular iron supplements to avoid yellowing leaves.

Plants.name: Skyblue Clustervine
Plants.Care Instructions: A delicate creeper with tiny blue flowers; perfect for covering small fences or balcony grills.

Plants.name: Indian Coral Tree
Plants.Care Instructions: The tree loses its leaves entirely before blooming into bright red

Plants.name: Sweet Pea
Plants.Care Instructions: Needs a cool root run; mulch the base and provide a net or strings for climbing.

Plants.name: Gloxinia
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Velvety flowers; water from the bottom to avoid getting spots on the delicate leaves.

Plants.name: Stephanotis (Madagascar Jasmine)
Plants.Growing Months: March, April, May, June, July, August, September
Plants.Care Instructions: Known as the "Bridal Veil"; requires high humidity and a strong trellis for support.

Plants.name: Dombeya (Tropical Hydrangea)
Plants.Care Instructions: Produces large pink hanging flower balls; attracts bees and butterflies in winter.

Plants.name: Pentas (Egyptian Star)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: One of the best plants for butterfly gardens; needs pinching to keep it from getting leggy.

Plants.name: Thunbergia (Blue Trumpet Vine)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: A very heavy climber; can cover an entire gate or wall quickly.

Plants.name: Hydrangea
Plants.Care Instructions: Will not bloom in the heat of the plains; requires acidic soil for blue color.

Plants.name: Coreopsis (Tickseed)
Plants.Growing Months: March, April, May, June, July, August
Plants.Care Instructions: Extremely drought-tolerant; perfect for sunny balconies and rock gardens.

Plants.name: Salvia
Plants.Care Instructions: Known for its bright red spikes; keep the soil moist but never waterlogged.

Plants.name: Chakunda (Cassia)
Plants.Care Instructions: Wild yellow flower often seen on roadsides; very hardy and low maintenance.

Plants.name: Pink Rain Lily
Plants.Care Instructions: Blooms overnight after a heavy rain shower; bulbs should be left undisturbed.

Plants.name: Vanda Orchid
Plants.Care Instructions: Should be grown in hanging baskets with no soil; mist roots twice daily.

Plants.name: Gomphrena (Button Flower)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Commonly used for dried flower arrangements; holds its color long after being cut.

Plants.name: Crossandra (Kanakambaram)
Plants.Growing Months: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
Plants.Care Instructions: Firecracker flower; sensitive to cold. Keep in a warm

Plants.name: Sweet William
Plants.Care Instructions: Produces bi-color clusters; requires cool nights to thrive.

Plants.name: Torenia (Wishbone Flower)
Plants.Care Instructions: Excellent for shaded balconies; keep the soil consistently damp.
